alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Idaho County through 145 PM PDT... At 101 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Craigmont, or 16 miles west of Kamiah, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ferdinand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
